title: D1 ADC, 20hr STREAM tomorrow (6th Dec), follow me to get updates on when I go live!

embed.description: OCE | aL SarahG XO | Diamond 1 ADC | SoloQ (✿◕‿◕)|

body:
Will be answering questions from twitch chat, looking for many new followers to build a great and friendly fanbase.

I have lots of competitive experience and am competing in the Oceanic Open Ladder soon.

Thanks,
XO

replies.body: great adc and chill stream. Gl with your goals friend.
